ls()" comparison.

Subject: [junit] assertSame failure


Hi!
In my tests, I'm =
modifying a value in a HashMap and then making sure 
the value has indeed b=
een modified. If I use "assertSame" the test 
fails, but if I use "assert" =
it passes. Is this a JUnit (v3.7) bug? 
Has anyone else encountered this?

=

(CONTACT_NAM=
E));

dMap.get
